TARGET_DECORATION__E - Static variable in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.ZestProperties
This attribute determines the target decoration for an edge.
TARGET_DECORATION_CSS_STYLE__E - Static variable in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.ZestProperties
This attribute determines the CSS style for the target decoration of an edge.
TARGET_LABEL__E - Static variable in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.ZestProperties
This attribute determines the target label for an edge.
TARGET_LABEL_CSS_STYLE__E - Static variable in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.ZestProperties
This attribute determines the CSS style for the target edge label.
TARGET_LABEL_POSITION__E - Static variable in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.ZestProperties
This attribute determines the position of an edge's target label (in case it exists).
toCssRgb(Color) - Method in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.jface.ZestContentViewer
Converts the given Color into a CSS string: "rgb(red,green,blue)".
TOOLTIP__N - Static variable in class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.ZestProperties
This attribute determines the tooltip for a node.
TransformLabelPolicy - Class in org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.policies
The TransformLabelPolicy is a specialization of the TransformPolicy that chains a ChangeAttributeOperation to affect the underlying model when transforming nodes.
TransformLabelPolicy() - Constructor for class org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.policies.TransformLabelPolicy
